chunk:
Beauty by Earth Foaming Face Wash, Peppermint Tea Tree

Brand: Beauty by Earth

Category: Facial Cleanser
book: 2620-Beauty by Earth Foaming Face Wash, Peppermint Tea Tree

chunk: Ingredients: Aqua, Saponified Oils of Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil* and Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Glycerin*, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Leaf Juice*, Menthe Piperia (Peppermint) Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Oil, Litsea Cubeba (Litsea) Oil, Citrus Sinensis (Orange) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Extract, Simmondsia
book: 2620-Beauty by Earth Foaming Face Wash, Peppermint Tea Tree

chunk: Leaf Juice*, Menthe Piperia (Peppermint) Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Oil, Litsea Cubeba (Litsea) Oil, Citrus Sinensis (Orange) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil* *Certified Organic Ingredient
book: 2620-Beauty by Earth Foaming Face Wash, Peppermint Tea Tree

chunk: Directions: : Dampen skin. Pump once onto your fingertips and massage into face in a circular motion. Rinse with clean water and pat dry.
book: 2620-Beauty by Earth Foaming Face Wash, Peppermint Tea Tree

chunk:
Mode d'emploi: Mouillez la peau. Pompez une fois le nettoyant sur le bout de vos doigts et massez-le pour le faire pénétrer dans votre visage en faisant des mouvements circulaires. Rincez à l'eau claire et séchez en tapotant.

Warnings: : For external use only. Stop using if irritation occurs.
book: 2620-Beauty by Earth Foaming Face Wash, Peppermint Tea Tree

chunk:
Warnings: : For external use only. Stop using if irritation occurs.

Avertissement: Pour usage externe seulement. Arrêtez de l'utiliser en cas de réaction.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 2620-Beauty by Earth Foaming Face Wash, Peppermint Tea Tree
